item.title: Lazy logger levels
item.description: Developers are lazy guys. They tend to make their lifes easier. I do it everyday. I never miss an opportunity to write a shell script or a shell bit instead of renaming 10+ files. Even when I know it will take exactly the same time as for the manual approach. Every software piece in the world, I hope, have some decent logging. Those stacks offer various logging levels, such as debug, info, warn, error, and fatal taking Ruby on Rails as an example.
